Name: Zoning, 2185 Coyle Street, Brooklyn (C 230248 ZMK).
Title: Application number C 230248 ZMK (2185 Coyle Street) submitted by 2185 Coyle Associates, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 29a: eliminating from within an existing R4 District a C1-2 District; changing from an R4 District to an R6A District; changing from an R4 District to an R7A District; changing from an R4 District to an R7X District; establishing within the proposed R6A District a C2-4 District; establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District; and establishing within the proposed R7X District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15, Council District 46.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
